attributes.action: Stop the BBC cutting jobs while paying Millions of Pounds to the likes of Jonathan Ross et al
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can the Director general justify so many job cuts when the BBC is paying so much for so called 'Talent'. 

There is plenty of young talent in this country that will not be given a break why the likes of Chris Moyles, Terry Wogan and Jonathan Ross are paied so much our license fee.

This a blantent protest against the BBC not receiving the extra £2bn it thinks  it needs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
